questions.title: What best describes your skin tone?
questions.description: This helps us recommend colors that complement your complexion

options.label: Fair

questions.description: Your daily routine affects color maintenance and suitability

aiProcessing.title: Analyzing Your Perfect Colors
aiProcessing.description: Talia is analyzing your features and preferences...

steps.message: Detecting facial features and skin tone...
Matching colors to your lifestyle preferences...

caramelHighlights.name: Caramel Highlights
caramelHighlights.description: Warm, honey-kissed highlights that add dimension and brightness
caramelHighlights.process: Hand-painted balayage with 20-vol developer, followed by honey-toned gloss for seamless blending

chocolateBrown.name: Rich Chocolate Brown
chocolateBrown.description: Deep, luxurious brown with subtle warm undertones
chocolateBrown.process: Deep base application with demi-permanent color, plus strategic lowlights for dimension

ashBlonde.name: Ash Blonde
ashBlonde.process: Multi-step lightening with purple-based toner to neutralize warmth and achieve cool undertones

strawberryBlonde.name: Strawberry Blonde
strawberryBlonde.description: Warm blonde with soft red undertones
strawberryBlonde.process: Sectioned foil highlights with warm copper base, blended with strawberry gloss overlay

burgundyOmbre.name: Burgundy Ombr√©
burgundyOmbre.description: Deep wine red fading from dark roots to vibrant ends
burgundyOmbre.process: Gradient lightening technique with creative color melting from natural base to vibrant burgundy ends

copperRed.name: Copper Red
copperRed.process: Pre-lightening with bond protection, followed by vivid copper application and golden highlight accents

colorRecommendations.title: This Is YOUR Color! üéâ
colorRecommendations.description: After analyzing your unique features, skin tone, and style preferences, our AI found the perfect color that will make you look absolutely stunning.
